relproducts.title: Rimini Black - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rimini in black is a classic jet black, rich in both depth and clarity of colour. Yet the fabric is still lightweight enough that it won't block out all of the light from the great outdoors. Ideal for an upstairs bedroom where a good night sleep is a must, the rimini black can serve as a bold new take on a coloured feature wall, or alternatively can be coupled and offset with a range of off-whites and greys to provide a very sleek and modern feel to a bedroom.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Duck Egg Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their stockholm duck egg roller blind is a beautiful light blue, green colour. So subtle in colour it works perfectly with natural and wooden tones throughout the home. The fabric is moisture restitance making it a 'go to' for kitchens and bathrooms. This lovely, blue blind also comes with 5 year guarantee as standard, giving you peace of mind that you blind is built to last. relproducts.description: The genesis black roller blind makes the perfect finishing touch to a modern, monochrome scheme. The practical roller design with its sleek lines and black fabric looks smart and stands out against white for an overall effect that is eye-catching yet minimalist. The lightweight dimout fabric creates a stylish window covering that offers privacy when required without dominating your space. relproducts.description: Stirloonyx black plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. relproducts.title: Rimini (Blackout) Black - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rimini (blackout) in black is simplicity at its best; the combination of the delicately textured blackout fabric with the classic and cool black hue makes this blind functional, stylish, and striking. The rimini black is perfect for any bedroom where the sole aim is the best nights sleep possible. Not one for the faint-hearted, this blind will make a statement in whichever room it's used, giving a particularly sleek yet moody look to any living room or dining room.

relproducts.title: Origin Black - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Don't be put off by the colour black's reputation; the origin in black is much more versatile, and can be far less moody, than you might think. Paired with the right dcor, the gloss aluminium slats and coordinated fittings can look simple and sophisticated. Set the black against white walls in a modern living room and complement with bright limes or fruity oranges for a step away from monochromatic living and towards boldness and colour.

relproducts.title: Lexington Blockout Cream Solar/thermal Pleated Free-hanging Blind
relproducts.description: Their lexington collection of thermal perfect fit pleated blinds is both luxurious and practical. Featuring their thermal fabric technology - these blinds keep your home warm in the winter whilst still maintaining the sophisticated look of pleated blinds. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds their lexington collection is ideal because of the celluar technology - honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit the heat transfer from your windows.
